reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.review:
Nothing buds 2024 with ultra bass 2.0 is a mid range earbuds for people who are looking for similar features as airpods pro. Again do not compare the quality; just the features. 
Build quality: 4/5
Ultra bass 2.0: 5/5
Sound by Dirac: 5/5
Battery: 4/5
Pros:
1) Sound quality by Direc is amazing. 
2) It has 4 HD quality mics with wind reduction feature. Although the person on the other side of the call can still hear 10% of wind blast when on bike. 
3) In ear deduction and find my earbuds works accurately. 
4) Transperancy mode and ANC mode are good at this price point. Tried the ANC mode while playing 70-80DB sound in background. It was quite impressive. Again do not compare it with airpods pro 2nd generation. 

Cons:
 1) The build quality of the earbuds and the box are average with a matte finish. No lanyard was included in the box as advertised. 
2) Ultra bass 2.0 is a gimmick its just a normal bass. 
3) Battery life span could've been better considering that it only lasts for 5-6 hours with ANC enabled. 
4) Light grey is the new white. So consider it as white.

reviews.title: Good choice
reviews.review:
My First wireless Ear buds ♡ .
Bass 4/5 - ultra bass option makes noticeable effect.
ANC is working well .
Connection strength  4/5 
Design 4/5 
Battery 4/5 

Over all value for Money .

reviews.title: Simply awesome
reviews.review:
Just Killer Product.
Everything can be controlled via the app and most importantly Sensor is top notch. 
When you just pull out from the ear the music is paused and when it again puts on the ear the music starts playing..
I really loved it in this price range.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review: Sound quality is ok, not worst not best, I don't like too bass heavy tunes, the dirac tuning supresses the mids imo. The fitting was not that snug in my ears I have to adjust them time to time to make them secure inside otherwise one comes loose and the in ear detection pauses whatever is playing, and another thing I didn't like was at high volumes there is too much sound leakage so people around you can hear clearly what you are listening to, in quiet rooms even medium volumes have sound leakage, otherwise all other features are awesome the anc,the in ear detection, the battery backup, google fast pair works like a charm just open the case and it gets connected, one feature I think it misses is there is no option for tap to play or pause content you either have to take out one of the ear buds to pause or you have to do it manually, the transparency mode is okish not that great, the hinge on the case is loose as other people also pointed out and the last thing is the battery indication is not accurate it will show 100 percent until it reaches 90 directly then 80and so on it doesn't show the accurate number of battery percentage left, overall it is a decent tws considering the price and the features offered in this price I would recommend. Ps: I forgot to mention the latency is also ok not bad I played few bgmi and cod matches with these on and they were pretty good but still would choose any wired earphones over these in case of gaming.

reviews.title: Value-for-money
reviews.review: Everything is good in this buds but 2 thinks missing first Charging cable i know that is not necessary but it is and second one is case rope for that special part if company provide holes for rope then company should give us. (but features and noice cancellation is ok ok)

reviews.title: Good choice
reviews.review: Godd quality buds.. Decent sound quality and built quality. I notice sound is more better with android phone than Iphone.. over all good product.. value for money..

reviews.title: Fabulous!
reviews.review:
Best buds in segment 
Bass : 10/10
ANC : 7/10 ( in segment ) transparency mode 🤩
U can feel anc without playing song fan noise will be completely muted. but buds pro is good in anc
Game mode 🤯
Soud quality : 10/10 no doubt   
Connectivity: 15 m range  automatically plays music when u place earbuds in ear and pause when u remove
Controls : volume up and down , play / pause , anc on/off ,google assistant , receive/ decline call 
Design: 10/10 case (mat finish ) and 8/10 buds ( glossy finish ) still looking 🔥 No  earbuds in market have such good looking case 🤤
Feels comfort , no pain for longer periods
Battery : i used it for 50 minutes while testing buds with  anc on only 10% drop 

CONS :

    No cable ( which u wont use ) 😂

I will definitely recommend to everyone. 😍
       
JUST GO FOR IT 🔥
